Hey Clawees!
In this version we've added a news feed for extra details about promotions!
We've also made slight improvements in Clawee's (already) good looks and fixed some bugs.
Hope you enjoy it!

Hey Clawees!
In this version we fixed some bugs for you and added a promo banners in our homepage.
Enjoy playing Clawee!

Enjoy Clawee :-)

Go get 'em!

Hey Clawees!
You're in for a super exciting new feature - Clawee's Freebie Shop!
Collect tickets with every game you play, and trade it in for prizes.
We've also fixed some bugs.
Enjoy playing Clawee

Complete challenges and progress through levels using your MAD Clawee skills!
